resources.string:
Ingredients: 
1. 1 cup carrot chopped 
2. 2 medium size potatoes chopped 
3. Handful green peas 
4. 1 capsicum chopped 
5. 2 tsp ginger-garlic paste 
6. 4 green chillies paste 
7. 2 tsp all purpose flour 
8. 1 tsp cornflour 
9. bread crumbs 
10. 1/2 tsp red chilli powder 
11. 1/2 tsp garam masala powder 
12. 1/2 tsp cumin powder 
13. Fresh cilantro chopped 
14. Oil to deep fry 
15. Salt to taste 
 Method: 
 Pressure cook all the vegetables with the little bit of salt for about 4-5 whistles. Leave to cool and then mash them in a big bowl. Now add all the spices, salt, flours, bread crumbs, paste and cilantro. Mix well and add 1 tsp of oil. Knead with you fingers to make a smooth cutlet dough. Heat sufficient oil in a pan. Make the small balls and then flatten to make a round shape. Deep fry 2-3 at a time until golden brown from both the sides. Place the fried cutlets on oil absorbent paper. Serve hot with chutney or sauce.
